product_name: Gaiam Sol Suddha Eco Yoga Mat - 2011 Closeout
long_description: The Gaiam Sol Suddha Eco yoga mat is made from a recyclable, biodegradable non-slip material, and is perfect for yogis who are not only passionate about their practice, but about the planet, as well. 100% recyclable, biodegradable thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) with a closed-cell structure prevents moisture and odors from being absorbed into the mat. 4mm padding keeps you comfortable while still allowing good balance. Spot clean with damp cloth, cold water and mild detergent; dry flat. Closeout.
short_description: The Gaiam Sol Suddha Eco yoga mat is made from a recyclable, biodegradable non-slip material, and is perfect for yogis who are not only passionate about their practice, but about the planet, as well.
